module.name: Conferences
module.description: Allow creation of conference rooms (meet-me) where multiple people can talk together.
module.changelog: *1.2* Fixed raising asterisk error on empty dialstatus #1708 *1.1.2* Add he_IL translation *1.1.1* Updated for 2.2.0RC1 *1.1* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed compatibility issue with new UI
